about_the_game:
Nassau lies in ruins. Its people look to you to restore it to its former glory. Your only choice? Take to the sea and become the most notorious pirate legend of all time. Will you loot, plunder, and decimate all who stand in your way as a fearsome renegade? Or will you use your strength and charisma to rise through the ranks of the Navy? Both these paths and anywhere in between are there for you to take in Seadogs of Nassau.

Explore Unsettled Seas

As an open-world Pirate RPG, Seadogs of Nassau aims to give you the freedom to live like a true warrior of the sea. In a world inspired by Caribbean and West African civilizations of the 17th century, you’ll come face-to-face with challenges both human and mystical.

Coordinate Brutal Naval Combat

Engage in exhilarating naval battles with a pirate vessel of your own making. Fight dirty or honorably with skills befit of a seafaring corsair.

Key Features:

  • A huge sandbox-world to explore
  • Command your fleet in tactical battles
  • Supply & demand trade system, affected by piracy, random events, & conflicts. When items are abundant, the prices go down and vice versa.
  • The world is full of random events from people being publicly hanged, diseases spreading, sailors smuggling contraband and so much more.
  • Each faction in Seadogs of Nassau offers unique perks to the player, from strong ships to powerful ports.
  • The world continues to evolve with or without your intervention. Factions will still attack each other, ports will run out of supplies, pirates will go on raids, etc.
detailed_description:
JOIN OUR TWITTER FOR UP TO DATE INFORMATION


About the Game



Nassau lies in ruins. Its people look to you to restore it to its former glory. Your only choice? Take to the sea and become the most notorious pirate legend of all time. Will you loot, plunder, and decimate all who stand in your way as a fearsome renegade? Or will you use your strength and charisma to rise through the ranks of the Navy? Both these paths and anywhere in between are there for you to take in Seadogs of Nassau.

Explore Unsettled Seas

As an open-world Pirate RPG, Seadogs of Nassau aims to give you the freedom to live like a true warrior of the sea. In a world inspired by Caribbean and West African civilizations of the 17th century, you’ll come face-to-face with challenges both human and mystical.

Coordinate Brutal Naval Combat

Engage in exhilarating naval battles with a pirate vessel of your own making. Fight dirty or honorably with skills befit of a seafaring corsair.

Key Features:

  • A huge sandbox-world to explore
  • Command your fleet in tactical battles
  • Supply & demand trade system, affected by piracy, random events, & conflicts. When items are abundant, the prices go down and vice versa.
  • The world is full of random events from people being publicly hanged, diseases spreading, sailors smuggling contraband and so much more.
  • Each faction in Seadogs of Nassau offers unique perks to the player, from strong ships to powerful ports.
  • The world continues to evolve with or without your intervention. Factions will still attack each other, ports will run out of supplies, pirates will go on raids, etc.
name: SeaDogs Of Nassau

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 35 GB available space

short_description: Die a pirate, rise a Caribbean terror! Shapeshift into mythic monsters (werewolf, storm-witch, ghost) to wreak havoc. But beware: hunters evolve, and your chaos scars the world forever.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
